亲，已经到达数量上限了哦！: Oops, you have reached the limit 99!
没有复制任何文字，请重新开始！: No text copied, please start again
请先结束复制再修改配置！: Please end the replication before modifying the configuration
请点击需要粘贴的地方: Please click where you want to paste first
自动粘贴失败仍可手动粘贴: When failed, you can still paste manually
$> Please fill up the text field...
所选音乐{}不可用，已禁用: The chosen music {} cannot be reached, disabled
如有需要，请检查音乐文件夹并手动开启音乐！: If you need music, please check the music directory and reenable the music option again!
是否保存修改: Do you want to save the changes
没有在音乐文件夹下找到合适的音乐文件，请放入音乐后再尝试开启此选项: No music was found in the music folder. Please put in music and try to turn on this option again
语言已修改，是否立即重启: Do you want to relaunch for language change
